nav.div: Cartwright School District » Parents & Community » News » What's New » COVID-19 Update

div.img:
Governor Doug Ducey announced the closure of all schools from Monday, March 16, 2020 through Friday, March 27, 2020. He stated that his office, along with school leadership, will continue to work together and assess this situation on a 24/7 basis. Click here to read his letter.
Continue to check our website's page on all updates related to the COVID-19 School Closures. You can access it here.
We have also compiled a list of resources for our students and their parents, click here to take a look at these resources.

div.div: 5220 W. Indian School Rd, Phoenix, AZ 85031 | Phone 623-691-4000 | Fax 623-691-4079
